评论详情: I've always been hesitant to try "Amazon Clothes". The sizes were always off. This time I followed the advice of the actual Seller and it turned out great. It's true to my size, and the color matches the picture. The weight of material is great, not too thin or bulky. I think it's a bit more dressy than regular track suits. Very comfortable, I'm hoping it washes well.
Bought this set for my 82 year old mom and she absolutely loved it! I bought the medium petite and she is 145# and 5' 2" and it fit perfect. So soft, can be dressed up or used for lounge wear.

The outfit is soft and comfy, but looks like pajamas.  The pants fit well and are a nice length, but the top is huge!  Hopefully it will shrink a little in the dryer.  I will hang the pants to dry, though, as they are just right.  It's a nice outfit for around the house, but I probably won't wear it out and about.

It is so stinking cute! The material is so soft. It is so comfortable. It is a dressy casual outfit I can wear to work or home. I will be ordering another! I'm so pleased. The fit is perfect. The length of the top and pants are a perfect fit for me. 5'4 183lbs
Great outfit that was of high quality, soft, and warm.  Was purchased as a gift and they loved it.  The size was a little larger than expected but worked well.

Color is rich fit is perfect weight of suit is flawless and has great overall look and feel. Quality of material is surprisingly great and value for price is a steal if you catch them on sale. Love everything about this.

I love everything about these outfits (I ordered 2 sets) except the size. The material is amazing. It’s soft and velvety feeling and does not wrinkle. The colors are beautiful (I got red and lilac). HOWEVER, they are NOT petite by any stretch of the imagination. They are way too long and way too big all over. Problem is, I hemmed pants before trying on the top so can’t return them. Oh well, my mistake!

I purchased three PinSpark two-piece athleisure sets, and I’m thoroughly impressed! The material is soft, with a good weight, and the fit is great. For reference, I’m 5’3” and 170 pounds, and I purchased a size large. The length of both the pants and the top is just right. I wore these sets during a trip to Nevada, and they kept me comfortable throughout the day. They washed well; I turned them inside out and hung them to dry. I used a steamer instead of an iron, which worked perfectly. Overall, I’m very pleased and would definitely buy more colors. Highly recommended!

Bought these because instagram got me and advertised these as the spanx air essential dupes for obviously a quarter of the price. However, you can feel the difference in the material. The spanx ones are some weird ethereal fiber and these are nice cottony, not as think or as comfy I would say. Definitely wash them first as they got a little bit softer after first wash. But also size down. They are rather big

The fabric is wonderful, very soft and seems durable.  I probably could have used a large rather than x-large, I'll change that when order a second set.  I must say I'm terribly disappointed the top does not have pockets!!  What would it take when everything else is of such quality??  Maybe the manufacturer will figure that out before I order again!  Another minor nit, the washing instructions sewn into the garment are not quite right.  They say do not tumble dry, other purchasers and I have tumble dried very successfully, there is no shrinkage or fabric damage

I ordered the orange set. I usually feel so disappointed by the clothes on Amazon because they either don’t fit or look like the reviews or pictures, but this set truly amazed me! They are soft and comfy, they look high end, and they (for once) are long enough! The material has a nice drape, but it is quite unforgiving to hide any lumps or bumps…I am praying they will last through a first wash. But for now, I would definitely love to get more

Very comfortable, soft fabric, I would give a 5 star other than it’s not as oversized as the description.  I wear a size 10/med, 125 # 5’ 3”,  it’s not terribly oversized.  Size up would be to large. Overall good purchase .

评论概述: Great find! I’m buying more colors.
评论详情: Fits great and material is comfy not too heavy and not to slim. It’s a great outfit for traveling. Only thing is the top doesn’t have any pockets. But that’s just a personal preference! I purchased a Med (although Amazon suggested a Large). I’m 5’7/160 pounds; pear shaped.

I can never find sets with bottoms that are short enough to fit my 5’4” frame, but this set is the perfect length!  I’m 125 lbs and I ordered the P/S.  They look nice on and feel great to the touch!  I got the light grey (not sure exactly what they called it) and it’s just what I wanted.

评论概述: Love it so much ordering another set!
评论详情: The feel of the fabric is what quality athletic leggings feel like. I am 5’2” and normally wear a size 6/8. I ordered the petite small and the fit is absolutely perfect. It’s roomy enough I don’t have to worry of it shrinking and it’s not so baggy that it looks oversized. The zipper is lined so you don’t feel the cold zipper against your skin. I ordered the red and it has a slight orange hint in color to it but not so much I would return it. (Because I don’t normally wear orange.) If there was any negative to it my only thought was I wish the top had a pocket. I am ordering another because I love it that much.
Runs big. I hit a medium and the jacket was very big on me and the pants were not flattering. The material was very cheap. Not worth the price.
I thought I ordered a petite medium, and on the tag it said p.m., but it was a little big. We decided to have alterations made because the product was so beautiful and beautifully made.
Great fit, soft material, very comfortable

评论概述: I odered aSmall petite topis fine but pants ae not petite too long.
评论详情: Pants of outfit too long.

I have bought the Spanx AirEssentials and like them a lot. I wanted a lighter beige color for travel and Christmas but Spanx didn’t have my color in petite available so I tried this not expecting much. I am really pleasantly surprised! It came quickly, I washed it before trying it on, it’s soft, it fits perfectly and it looks and feels like Spanx quality! I love it! I am 5’5” and 185lbs I buy Spanx AirEssentials in XL petite. I bought this in L petite and it fits like a glove! Great for travel, running errands and lounging
Oversized fit. You can easily size down at least one. Pants are super long but do-able for 5’4”. Some pilling after 3-4 washes.
I ordered the petite. Suggested for 5’4 and under. I m 5’3 and it was too long. Otherwise I loved it

I ordered 2 of these sets in xs petite. The length is ok, the top and bottom are VERY large. They are both way to LARGE and too roomy to look nice on me, just swallowed me up. So disappointed this lounge set did not work for me.

I purchased this to wear on a flight. It was perfect, it was very comfortable. In addition, it was perfect for the cold weather in NYC. I will definitely recommend the purchase. It's a great value for the money.

Wonderful color, style and so soft and comfortable.  I normally would have ordered a Large but after reading reviews I downsized to Medium Petite and so glad I do.  The fit is perfect.  I am 5'4", weight 160.

Being only 5 foot tall, I can never find petite outfits that actually fit length wise. If I roll the waist band down the length is perfect and isn’t bulky like some waistbands can be when rolled! I’ve bought 2 sets so far and LOVE them!
love the fit and material, just wish they were a little longer i am 5'9 and could use an inch longer.
Runs a bit large, I ordered a size below and it worked. I love the green color and great material. Washes well.

This is my new go to for long distance travel. The material is soft and easy to clean. The material is substantial but still so soft.  Only thing I wish it came with different pant lengths. I had to hem since I am short.
La tela es suave, pero los colores tienden a ser un poco mas claros que en la foto y la talla corre grande asi que aconsejo si usa una M comprar la S.
Size good, fabric soft, pretty color and comfortable. Washed well but no dryer.
I loved this set... Material and a little style made it perfect! However the legs and sleeves were too long and I was swimming in it. At 5'1 and 120 pounds even the small was too large.

评论概述: I liked this set except the top is way oversized. But if I wear a turtleneck under it it’s ok.
评论详情: I liked the color and the fabric.

I bought this set in 2 colors and plan on ordering more. I love them that much. Not only is it super soft, but it comes in petite so the length is perfect.  Please bring more petite sets. I will say I think it runs a bit big, I could've worn an XS petite,  but I will keep it and enjoy how roomie they are.
Great quality. Material very soft
Look the feel of the outfit. It is very comfortable and easy to care for.
Great fit
Order this  for my birthday  in November My family took me to Branson for a celebration Wore it out got lots of compliments from people Going to order more for my trip to Jamaica

This set is so soft and comfortable when I tried it on and it seems like it does not wrinkle . I ordered a petite medium I am 5’ 115 pounds and it was loose and very high waisted with pockets . I love it so much I ordered a PS to see if that’s a-little more fitted on me . I am keeping one no matter what .  This outfit is great for traveling. I ordered the color black .  Great price too!!! Would make a nice gift.

Ordered the red in petite xxl. It’s definitely oversized but not sloppy and the petite length is perfect for my 5’3-4” pear shaped frame. Could probably go down to xl comfortably too for a less relaxed fit.  Will be buying more sets in different colors for sure!!

My new hobby is searching for 2 pc outfits on Amazon. This outfit is absolutely amazing. I’m 5-6 180 lbs and the large fits so well. It says oversized (which is why I chose it). The hot pink is more of a deep dark pink, it’s beautiful. The price was right and shipped super fast!
Wife loves them . The petite sizes are great for her. Purchased 4 colors for her for christmas..
It’s a great fit I love it this is my 3 one purchased and I definitely recommend it
This two piece set runs a little too big.  Top a little too long for a petite.  I’m keeping it because it’s comfortable.

Ordered a medium petite in black. Nice well made. Should wash/dry well. A little long on me — I am only 5 feet. Going to have pants shortened. For the price point and cost of shortening still much less than many out there. Very comfortable and ontime great delivery. Recommend.

I got the petite medium and it was a little too long and baggy but the fabric was really nice and soft. It looks really nice. I'm ordering the small and hoping that is a good fit. I'm 5'2" about 450lbs.
This outfit is both comfortable and stylish. It can be worn to lounge around the house or to run to do errands. The fabric is substantial and washable. A great buy
Love this.  Not a heavy weight material, but heavy enough for south Alabama in January.
Love the comfort. Great hanging around the house.  Petite was still long. Ordered large but could have used a medium.  Keeping because it is just for lounging at home.

Ok, let me start by saying I have looked everywhere for a set like this. I wanted navy and I needed petite. I’ve tried so many.. even the big money one that started the trend.. all absolutely horrible on my post menpausal, short, fupa having body. I didn’t have high expectations for this one, since it was only $35. Let me tell you, it’s great! I am 5’1” and 177lb, 36k boobs and the menopause apron belly. The large petite is perfect on me. It’s very flattering and comfy! The material is soft, no weird odor and it’s a perfect navy. I could not be happier!

Go buy this set! I bought it in red and the color is vibrant, the fabric is silky and soft and the fit is perfect! I’m a pear shape and have a hard time finding sets that fit both top and bottom but these were perfect. Definitely recommend.
It is just as it appears. Comfortable and great quality. The fit is perfect as well.

Love the style, versatility, comfort, stretchiness of this outfit. I purchased a size medium in black and wore it on an international flight. So happy I bought this to travel in for 15 hours! Great purchase!

I absolutely love this set! It's soft, comfortable and pretty. I wore it to work and many of my colleagues admired it. Needless to say, I shared the link and they were ordering before we left the meeting! Great value and quality compared to others I've purchased! If you order one, I hope you like yours as much as I do!
So comfortable and I get a lot of compliments every time I wear it.

I bought this for a trip to India, where I was going to be flying for nearly 20 hours total, and wanted to look out together but comfortable.  I’m 5’ 7”, 34DD, and around 165 pounds, so I bought a L.  It gives me an oversized fit so the top covers my bum and I can sort of curl up in it.  The legs are long enough that they touch the ground in bare feet (but not with sneakers), and there’s a drawstring waist to cinch it higher or lower on the waist as you prefer.It’s very light weight/thin but the material lays well.  The 3/4 zip means you can control how much of your neck you want open to the air (and therefore temperature).My only complaint is that the top doesn’t have pockets.  I would have liked side pockets to store my passport as I was moving around the airport but there are pockets in the pants so that’s a minor quibble.

It runs big and the pant length shrunk in the dryer . I am 5,3 ordered a small . Both still fit me and I can still wear the pants with sneakers so it’s not a deal breaker BUT don’t put pants in dryer !  But so comfy and cute ! I’ll order in more colors . Perfect hanging in house outfit or running errand outfits

评论概述: Me gustó mucho la textura de la tela
评论详情: Me agrado la textura de la tela el color y las medidas son exactas.

评论概述: Just what I was hoping for.
评论详情: Soft, comfortable, great fit (5'51/2", 148 lbs) with the medium.  Wore it today running errands.  Very glad of the purchase.
This outfit is great. Very soft and comfy. Fit us true to size. Not much shrinkage after washing and drying. Good material
Material is so soft!  This is my 2nd suit!  Wonderful for lounging and dressy enough for shopping and flying!
fit my body
Love this set! It’s so comfortable and soft. I got one for my daughter and daughter in law too. It washes great. No wrinkles.
The fabric is nice and comfortable. Get for travel or lounge. I ordered a medium and it was a little big bt still wearable.

Everything about the fit and material speaks of a high-end lounging outfit you won't be embarrassed to wear out shopping.  And I LOVE the waistband!  That said, the lighter colors will hold onto every stain you get on it.  The darker the material, the more you will like it.  I bought the VERY pretty light dusty green color and it already has kitchen stains.  I plan on buying another one in Petite Medium but in the darkest color there is.  I would have given this 5 stars were it not for the inability to get stains completely out.
Very nice and comfortable.  And is fashionable.
Comfortable and great fit love it

Lightweight ultrasoft material great style with the zip and wide leg pants and finally a set with petite length! Love the taupe color will wear this a lot! Haven't washed it yet so will see on how it wears for the medium range price.
Very comfy but I could have gone done 1 size.
Fabric is nice and soft. Color was beautiful. Buy a smaller size of what you regularly use as it runs too big. I had to returned it twice.

评论详情: Looks amazingbon washes nd dryer no wrinkles total satisfiedbi bought on e for me nd one for my daughter 👍👍👍❤️

This is from my granddaughter who is 22 years old and this looks wonderful on her and it’s extremely comfortable and soft. She is extremely happy with these.

I bought four and give them as Christmas gifts. Everyone loved them! They loved the way it fit, looked and felt.
Fits beautifully and fabric is very nice.
Beautiful track suit!  Love the material & that it is tall girl friendly!  Great purchase!
Good quality, fits great
Fits great! I'm 5'2" and orderd the petite. So glad they offered petite length in this outfit.
It’s so soft and comfy. Wine color is beautiful. Very happy with this purchase

Quality was outstanding. Soft, warm, and well constructed. Brought the navy blue  in a regular large for a tall young lady who has trouble with length pants. These are just right. Highly recommend getting a petite if you are under 5.7. I recommend this set and brought 3 more.
Fabric is so soft and color is just like pictured. I’m 5’ 1 and the length is perfect!
I ordered this for all my girlfriends as a Christmas gift. Love them
Material is soft. Very good value. Have as a gift and recipient loved it.
This fits so good and the quality is amazing. Def recommend

评论详情: I had not bought this brand before and had to return it as I am petite and it ran very large.
This is exactly what I was looking for! Very comfortable and lightweight.
I love this set so soft and so comfortable!! Definitely going to buy more in different colors!

I purchased 3 sets, navy, green and gray in size large.  I'm155 lbs, 38 DD chest andmy waistline needs clothing with elastic waist lines these days. Lol.  I'm also 5'3" tall.  The length was ok.  The pants fit fine. The top is really oversized.  I washed all setsIn cold water and dried in delicate low cycle somewhat.  They were a little damp when I hung them up.  I didn't have any shrinkage.  The quality is good.  Shipping was very good.  The top is too big but comfy.
The set is soft and comfortable . At 5'9" I found a nice outfit that comes below the ankles at a great price. The top is long & cover bulges, which I needed. Great for the cold season.
Loved the color, great quality and roominess on the legs.
Love the color, material quality and the fit.
Beautiful, comfortable, soft fabric and true to size .
So comfy the quality was perfect RECOMMEND

Great 2 piece set, comfy and wrinkle free. Color is just like the picture and this suit is perfect for traveling.

This outfit is so pretty and soft.  It’s not just for lounging but beautiful enough to be worn out in public!  No one would know it’s loungewear!
Washes very well. This is a very comfortable outfit. Great to travel in, it stays very nice all day. Very good value for the money. Purchased 3 colors.
